languages.text: "Я знаю этих людей много дольше вас. Все их привычки, жесты, причуды поведения. И я уверен, что смогу по их поведению определить, кто из них стоял за организацией смуты".

"I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю этих людей много дольше вас. Все их привычки, жесты, причуды поведения. И я уверен, что смогу по их поведению определить, кто из них стоял за организацией смуты".

traits.locale_text: "I have known those people for far longer than you — their gestures, habits, behaviour quirks. And I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them were responsible for the riots by their behaviour."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「貴族家の面々につきましては、陛下よりも我の方がはるかに多くのことを存じております。そのジェスチャー、習慣、言い訳の癖に至るまで。貴族たちの行動から、誰が暴動に関与したかを見極めることができると確信しております」
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族家の面々につきましては、陛下よりも我の方がはるかに多くのことを存じております。そのジェスチャー、習慣、言い訳の癖に至るまで。貴族たちの行動から、誰が暴動に関与したかを見極めることができると確信しております」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我比您更熟悉这些贵族，我了解他们的举止、习惯和癖好。我相信我能够从他们的反应中，找出这场骚乱的始作俑者。”
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: “我比您更熟悉这些贵族，包括他们的举止、习惯和癖好。我相信我能够从他们的反应中，找出这场骚乱的始作俑者。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je connais ces gens depuis bien plus longtemps que vous, leurs mimiques, leurs habitudes, leurs tics... Je suis sûr de pouvoir déterminer qui parmi eux est responsable des révoltes rien qu'en observant leurs réactions. »
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: « Je connais ces gens depuis bien plus longtemps que vous, leurs mimiques, leurs habitudes, leurs tics... Je suis sûr de pouvoir déterminer qui parmi eux est responsable des révoltes rien qu'en observant leurs réactions. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Los conozco desde mucho antes que usted. Me sé de memoria todos sus gestos, hábitos y rarezas. Estoy seguro de que podré determinar cuáles de ellos fueron responsables de los disturbios solo por su comportamiento».
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: «Los conozco mucho antes que usted. Me sé de memoria todos sus gestos, hábitos y rarezas. Estoy seguro de que podré determinar cuáles de ellos fueron responsables de los disturbios solo por su comportamiento».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kenne diese Leute schon sehr viel länger als Ihr. Ich kenne all ihre Gesten, Gewohnheiten und Schrullen. Und ich bin mir sicher, dass ich aus ihrem Verhalten ablesen kann, wer von ihnen für die Aufstände verantwortlich war."
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne diese Leute schon sehr viel länger als Ihr, auch ihre Gesten, Gewohnheiten und Schrullen. Und ich bin mir sicher, dass ich aus ihrem Verhalten ablesen kann, wer von ihnen für die Aufstände verantwortlich war."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bu insanları sizden çok daha uzun zamandır tanıyorum. Mimiklerini, huylarını, kendilerine has davranışlarını tümüyle biliyorum. Hâl ve hareketlerine bakarak hangisinin isyanlardan sorumlu olduğunu anlayabileceğime eminim."
languages.original_text: "I have known those people far longer than you have. I know all their gestures, habits, and behavioural quirks. I am sure that I will be able to determine which of them was responsible for the riots based on their behaviour."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kişileri sizden çok daha uzun süredir tanıyorum. Mimiklerini, huylarını, kendilerine has davranışlarını tümüyle biliyorum. Hâl ve hareketlerine bakarak hangisinin isyanlardan sorumlu olduğunu anlayabileceğime eminim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
